author: Kelly Mena, CNN
title: Gun retailers deemed 'essential service' by federal government
description: As states around the country issue "stay-at-home" orders amid the coronavirus pandemic, firearm and ammunition retailers have been designated an "essential service," according to updated guidance from the federal government.
content:
Washington, DC (CNN)As states around the country issue "stay-at-home" orders amid the coronavirus pandemic, firearm and ammunition retailers have been designated an "essential service," according to updated guidance from the federal government.
